title: Baby Quilt
description: \"fleur-de-lis\" style applique in center red diamond set over printed blue/black plaid diamond with some applique on satin triangle corners; border is geometric swastika applique; all designs edged in machine made patterned tape; lined
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
